name: The Stubborn of WakGood: Afterheat
storyline:
Once upon a time, there was a streamer called Woowakgood.
he played games and worked on his computer,
Not every day was special, but he was happy.
One day, he discovered a very peculiar game.
that had never been cleared...
This enticing and bewitching game allured him to play self.
The game seemed to call him to come in and play, so he indulged.
However, some things cannot be achieved with effort alone.
Also, there are times when unfulfilled desires become deeply rooted in the heart.
Such things often arrive when a person is most vulnerable.
So will he be able to clear the game this time? Hmm.. well.
summary:
This game is a fan game by YouTuber Woowakgood with the motif of Isaac Original.
We respect the original Isaac Original, and we do not want to be a substitute for that game. The creators do not distribute the game for a fee or generate revenue through copyright. This game can be downloaded from YouTuber Woowakgood's Naver fan cafe "왁물원".
